title: Synthesis and electrochemical evaluation of nickel hydroxide nanosheets with phase transition to nickel oxide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10172-10181
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01120A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Minjeong Lee, Yeongeun Jang, Gayoung Yoon, Seonghwa Lee, Gyeong Hee Ryu
Nickel hydroxide nanosheets are perfectly synthesized, are 3–6 nm thin and exhibit a curly and wrinkled morphology with increasing surfactant concentration. They demonstrate OER activity and are transformed into nickel oxides via heat treatment.
